trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around April 6th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was driving down the street, we all noticed what look like a huge box in the sky with so many really white lights,the lights seem to like keep going to the right to left, right to left and at the same time a light seen to be going down also... it was so big and bright, also silent this happen on 4-6-2012 at 9:10 pm I know we all not the only ones who saw this object in the sky.. ...
